name: cera-workspace
description: Monorepo workspace containing CeraUI frontend and belaUI backend
author: Andr√©s Cera

scripts.lint: biome check . ; pnpm --filter backend run check ; pnpm --filter frontend run check ; pnpm --filter backend run lint ; pnpm --filter frontend run lint
scripts.lint:fix: biome check --write . ; pnpm --filter backend run lint:fix ; pnpm --filter frontend run lint:fix
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ && pnpm --recursive --filter "./apps/*" run clean && rm -rf node_modules
